title_short: (46690) L'Alcúdia de Crespins - 29B Avinguda Corts Valencianes
description: Dirt parking in front of the soccer field. I have spent the night here, I have not seen any prohibition sign. Very quiet night.

title: (46690) L'Alcúdia de Crespins - 10 Carrer del Cementeri
title_short: (46690) L'Alcúdia de Crespins - 10 Carrer del Cementeri
description:
Lovely  small area next to the river 
Quite with a bit shade 
I was not sure if you are allowed to stay there, but a few locals walked past, and no one said anything 
The first cold water we found in Spain?
there is also a path that leads you to a nice water fall with a natural pond , swiming pool is not easy access, but it is definitely worth giving it a go 
We only stopped there for a few hours, so I'm not really sure how the overnight stay but it looks like it should be ok
I visited it with my van, so I'm not sure about bigger,heavier cars due to a little drop from concrete road to hard ground, but nothing
 major (I think)

title: (46650) Canals - 291 Partida del Tunel

title: (46800) Xàtiva - 116A Bolvens Pol-18
description: We spent a quiet night. Very narrow street. Not suitable for large campers. right on the edge of the forest. barking dogs of the residents, otherwise quiet. surrounded by forest and many walking and hiking opportunities. no toilets and take your rubbish with you!

title: (46850) L'Olleria - 10 Calle Proyecto Número 3
description:
NEW motorhome area in L'Olleria that replaces the previous one.
It consists of 4 parking spaces in an urban, quiet, flat and level area
Water filling service, emptying of gray and black water.
Beautiful excursions in the mountains
Close to bars, restaurants and supermarkets, bakery and laundry.
You can visit the town with a glass museum.
Thanks to the town hall for this service.

It’s away from the houses so no-one seemed to mind too much and it’s surprisingly quiet.

title: (46839) Bellús - C. Petra Julve
description:
Visit the natural site of l'Estret de les Aigües and the cave paintings of the Cova de la Petxina. The Palau de Bellvis, included in the inventory of the Architectural Heritage of historical-artistic interest and the Hermitage of the Holy Christ of the Good Death.
From A-7 take exit 11 (Gandia / L'Olleria) and follow CV-60 towards N-340 / Gandia / L'Olleria. Take N-340 towards Alfarrasí. Before reaching Bellús, turn right towards CV-612 (Benigànim / Quatretonda). At 750 m turn left towards Av. Balneario and follow the signs to the municipal swimming pool.
Fee will be paid at the Town Hall
YOU MUST GO TO THE CITY COUNCIL TO DEPOSIT THE AMOUNT

title: (46691) Valencia -
description: Free municipal parking at the tourist office above the village. Gravelled area planted with olive trees for about 10 mobile homes. Toilet disposal facility, but no toilets or fresh water. 10 minutes walk from the village. Nice and quiet place with hiking and climbing possibilities. Point of payment at the entrance of the restaurant "El Romer". Please keep the site clean (there is a dumpster on site) and support Vallada with its restaurants and shops. IMPORTANT: Do not cross the village (road limit of 2m!!!) but via Industrie (outside the village).

name: Benissuera
title: (46839) Benissuera
description: Benissuera has a motorhome parking area with a Punt Net, a service area where gray and black water can be drained and drinking water can also be replenished. It also offers electricity connection by payment with tokens. Next to the area there are “paelleros”, with picnic tables. It is located next to the municipality and has interesting paths for walking or cycling next to the reservoir.

title: (46691) Vallada -

title: (46821) Chella - 275 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Only for vans because very complicated for motorhomes. Small car park near Salto de Chella, stuck to the road and next to the river. Two vans can be put there or even three. I stayed there the night of December 23rd. It's next to the river. No toilet, water to 25mts.

title: (46822) - 568 Diseminado Diseminados

name: B&B Casa Mil Sueños
title: (46870) B&B Casa Mil Sueños
description: Discover the beauty of the Spanish interior with a stay at our atmospheric small-scale camping spot! Enjoy a relaxing getaway in this perfect location and transit route. Due to the limited number of places, calling in advance, whatsapp is recommended. With only a few camper pitches, our camping spot offers a quiet and intimate atmosphere that you won't find on larger campsites. Book now and experience the magic of camping in Spain's Tuscany.

title: (46691) Vallada - 88 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Stop with the possibility of shade next to the gas station. It is not a good place to sleep because of the noise from the highway.

title: (46860) Albaida - 32 Plaça Poligono 8
description: Parking lot next to the train station, that has been abandoned and not in use anymore

title: (46267) Gabarda - 151 CV-5590
description: Landscaped recreational area between poplars, willows and elms located next to the Puente del Rey, a civil engineering work carried out at the end of the 18th century and which was never finished. It can be visited at any time because it is outdoors in an environment surrounded by orange groves. There is a recreation area for the walk and it is part of a small cycle path or greenway that borders the course of the Júcar river. There is also an old brick kiln area accessed by a pedestrian ramp and near the bridge is a small amphitheater.

title: (46822) Bolbaite - 9 CV-580
description: Spectacular pine forest around the Santa Bárbara hermitage, surrounded by nature and with little passage of people since it is located at the top of the mountain. Within the area of the hermitage there are a multitude of picnic tables, barbecues, bathrooms, fountains and a restaurant. From there you can see beautiful views of Bolbaite and the castle. There is a first small, more feral parking lot and another one a little higher up with asphalt ground and street lamps (they turn off at 1.30 in the morning, leaving you completely in the dark at night). Perfect place for those looking for absolute tranquility in the middle from the field and let go of children and dogs. Careful! there are wild boars in the area. Trick of the house: in the bathrooms there is a plug, parking in the upper parking lot you can pull an extension cord and connect to the power :-) The same to fill water in the fountain behind the restaurant or in the bathroom sink: with a very long hose you can fill the tank. Garbage and glass containers available. Great as a base camp to visit the river. Another trick of the house: in the recreational area of the river (where you go down some stairs to it, in front of the cooperative) there is another accessible source hidden, with a little nose you can put the van or motorhome next to it.

title: (46267) Gavarda -
description: Small paved dead end in the middle of the orange trees.

title: (46860) Albaida - 14 Travessera Bufali
description: A wide esplanade where to park, without services but enough to visit the town. 5 minutes from the town center.

AC area in Otos. Small mountain village with a small supermarket, bars, bakery, swimming pool behind the area with showers and changing rooms in summer, €3 for admission. The town has a very nice guided sundial route.
Near the Benicadell peak where you can go hiking or mountain biking.
Free emptying and filling of water at 200m.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 267 Plaça Numero 14
description: Parking of the Onteniente cemetery free parking there is also a dirt side street where you go to the beginning of several hiking trails, apparently there is no provision to park you can not camp and pet dogs With Leash

title: (03837) Alfafara - Unnamed Road
description: Good walking in this area, lots of trails. Best place to drive up from is the cemetery in Ontinyent, take the track that gors to the right of the cemetery, follow it all the way up and you'll see lots of potential places to stay

title: (46870) Alfafara - CV-6620
description: Superb place between the trees and the nature reserve, which allowed us not to have too much wind during the night. A great place to start a hike.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 7 Avenida del Carmen
description: Asphalted parking in front of the Dulmatesa factory, perfect for hiking, seeing the town and making routes.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 20 Calle la Fuente
description: Public parking of the town, paved and with light, in front of the civil guard, we spent a very quiet night, right next to it there are excursions to go to the chorradores de Navarres although there is a day parking later that is the starting point of the excursion.

title: (46870) Alfafara - CV-6620
description: Parking next to the track. Ideal to see the sunset and the stars. Recommended in spring and autumn. 10 'by van from the famous Pou Clar in Ontinyent. Beautiful views over the town and a ravine.

title: (46840) - 440 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Recreational area about 2km. from the village with barbecue and tables. At the top there is a parking space for small vans, but below there is a large terrace to park. Nice views of Benicadell and the Bellús reservoir

title: (46823) Navarrés - 6 Carretera Subida Calvario
description: Day and night parking is allowed as long as no 'trash' is taken out. Very beautiful views from the Ermita de Navarrés to the town, with some shade, a few picnic tables and next to a park, although it is now sealed off to rehabilitate it. Nearby you have the house of the Little Mouse Pérez and the corridor of pacifiers, very cool for little ones. Los Chorradores, Playamonte nearby and the Escalona dam also with a free bathing area

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 57 Plaça Numero 19
description: This is an area we used to park our 6M van to visit the Por Clau waterfall, you just need to walk along the main road for two minutes. We parked here from 11:30-16:15 on a Wednesday.

title: (46260) Alberique - 8 Calle J-G Sector R
description: Quiet verge. Can be good for one night in transit. Good emergency sleeping place when it is too windy in the mountains.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - CV-81
description: Excellent place to spend the night. very calm.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful spot on top of the hills with amazing views. It is an open place so when it’s windy you will be exposed. However for that same reason you can enjoy both sunset and sunrise from here. The road up from the CV-660 is concrete paved and on top of the hill it becomes a dirt road.

title: (03838) - 3 Lugar Diseminados
description: Parking of the Ermita de San Antonio, is not completely level but sufficient. Perfect to go visit the nearby caves. It has Barbecues. Quiet place. Tables and barbecues

title: (03838) Alfafara -
description:
Small patch able to fit one motor home. 
V quiet, stunning views, right next to hike path to beautiful unique cave. 

please be respectful of locals, a few walked by and we said hola and seemed intrigued yet content to see us. 

n.b.** drinking water is a 20 minute uphill walk to natural fountain!!!

name: Aparcamiento Los Chorradores
title: (46823) Aparcamiento Los Chorradores
description: Large dirt parking lot at the start of the hike to the "Los Chorradores" waterfalls. Very calm. Overnight stays are allowed, but not camping.

title: (46843) El Ràfol de Salem - 166 Plaça Poligono 3
title_short: (46843) El Ràfol de Salem - 166 Plaça Poligono 3
description: Picnic area with drinking water supply, seating, very quiet, lots of shade, children's playground, overnight stay no problem, take your rubbish with you!

title: (46823) Navarrés - Urbanización Playa Monte 2
description: Forest parking lot, which is signposted as a camping area. There are toilets, sinks for washing up and even showers. The barbecue areas are open depending on the season. Very quiet, even on weekends.

title: (46295) Sumacàrcer -
description: Small parking space overlooking the lake

title: (46749) Carcaixent -
description: NO DOGS! Very large free municipal area, for mobile homes, caravans and tents, very well maintained. Closed on Mondays and Tuesdays and in August. Arrive before 6pm to be opened by the guard. Parking is limited to 48 hours. Locals come here to have picnics. Large playground, football and basketball field. Nice walks in the hills.

title: (46269) Tous - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in a cul de sac just before the dam ... Very quiet at night.

name: RabbitSong
title: (03838) RabbitSong
description:
Private stop and overnight area for caravans and motorhomes. We are located in Alfafara (Alicante), within the Serra de Mariola and 10' from Bocairent, 30' from Alcoi and barely an hour from Valencia and Alicante.

We offer good sanitary facilities and spacious plots as well as a swimming pool and all the necessary services for a comfortable and pleasant stay: water and electricity connection, black and gray water disposal, toilets and showers, WIFI, washing machine, bread service on demand. .. We are dog/pet friendly.
Rates to be agreed with the owner.

Come and enjoy a unique natural environment with your family. We are waiting for you!

It is a space without noise, in the middle of nature where at night you will enjoy a clean sky full of stars.

It is a flat terrain, with easily accessible grass cover, without limitation for the size of tents, caravans and motorhomes.

The house has outside toilets for guests. We count on your help to keep the facilities clean and make responsible use of water and electricity.

title: (46269) Tous - 65 Camino Cementerio
description: At the heart of the village "Tous", there is a recreation area to park at least 3 motorhomes. Around are available: children's games, barbecue area and fitness trail. There is also a water fountain. The locals are very nice if you want to talk to them.

title: (46870) Ontinyent - 10 Plaça Numero 21
description: Hermitage of Morera (Ontinyent). Quiet place to spend the night in contact with the rural environment. 7 km from the Natural Park of Pou Clar. Near the towns of Ontinyent and Fontanars dels Alforins.

title: (46260) - 54 Plaça Numero 36
description: It's a gas station, there is a water outlet to fill, the water outlet is very old ... if you put gas, it is no problem

title: (46640) - 2E Plaça Poligono 29
description: The rest area for motorhomes It is located on the 25-hectare farm La Bodega Casa Rural. Space destined exclusively for AC is surrounded by vineyards and olive groves. Privileged place overlooking the Cañoles river is an important viewpoint of a migratory pass. Fully guarded. No facilities only parking space. No chairs tables or cooking outside the camper.

title: (46759) Simat de la Valldigna - 2A Barri Pla de Corrals
title_short: (46759) Simat de la Valldigna - 2A Barri Pla de Corrals
description: Very large and flat gravel parking area. We enjoyed a very peaceful night here. Beautiful mountain views. One minute walk to local village with a lovely little tapas bar. Rubbish bins, water and large BBQ area.

title: (46841) - 71 Plaça Diseminado
description: It is a parking lot of an outdoor playground with a picnic area, benches and a grill. Suitable for Mercedes Sprinter, good access, very quiet

title: (46823) Navarrés - 165 Diseminado Diseminados
description: A very very quiet place we stayed one night and very beautiful

title: (46823) Navarrés - 165 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Very quiet place on the edge of the reservoir. We went to see a place that is right next door, but we preferred to move about 200 meters since in this place we were more sheltered both from the wind and with more privacy.

title: (46740) Carcaixent - 12 Avinguda de la Lira Carcaixentina
title_short: (46740) Carcaixent - 12 Avinguda de la Lira Carcaixentina
description: Ample parking to park. Quiet and safe area. Near the train station to go to Valencia or Xativa. Nearby supermarkets and restaurants. I recommend La Roja to eat paella. At the train station there is an area to empty black and gray water. At 8 km there is also the Hort de Soriano area.

title: (46749) Carcaixent - Carrer de les Corts Valencianes
title_short: (46749) Carcaixent - Carrer de les Corts Valencianes
description: Large car park next to the train station, noisy but central, full of water, as well as gray water and black water

title: (46824) - 6 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: Asphalt parking of the city sports center. drinking water, shade and parking. Climbing areas, via ferrata, river with pools for bathing just over 7 km away by paved road Access to the parking lot is a steep ramp but without problems for a motorhome. I travel with a 7.5m and I have not had a problem.

title: (03839) Muro d'Alcoi - 10 Partida Turballos
description: Place on the side of the road at the entrance of the town. There is only one place, for campers or motorhomes that do not have a hitch behind. Further on in the village there is also space. Drinking water and table to eat

title: (03837) Agres - Unnamed Road
description: The Molí Mato leisure area has toilets, showers, water, grills and picnic tables. Very shady and quiet. From there the hiking trails through the Mariola mountain range start. Enjoy it without leaving a trace.

title: (46880) Bocairent - 2B Carrer de Joaquim Sorolla
description: Upper part of the city, quiet area with beautiful views. It is very close to the old town, walking around is highly recommended. Fairly well leveled but with much better shims. It is accessed from the back of the city, on the other side there are narrow streets.

title: (03837) Agres - 117 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Little space but beautiful and you can eat super well in the restaurant right next door. From here you go up to Montcabrer.

title: (03839) Muro de Alcoy - 303 Carretera de Agres
title_short: (03839) Muro de Alcoy - 303 Carretera de Agres
description: Picnic area with benches and a fountain by the river. Parking where you can sleep without problems. Attention narrow access road.

name: Camping Villa Carmen
title: (46880) Camping Villa Carmen
description: Camping Villa Carmen

title: (46880) Bocairente - 23 Avenida San Blas
description: Facing the cemetery, beautiful view of the village, easy access, flat terrain, departure for beautiful walks

title: (46838) Pinet - 6 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking on public road adjacent to municipal sports facilities on the outskirts of the village of Pinet. No through traffic Public fountain Picnic area with tables and benches. Public barbeque area. Children's play area. Public swimming pool with outdoor showers in summer (registration required). Small shop and bar in village.

title: (46880) Bocairent - 13 Carrer Pallisetes
description: Very good location, overlooking the town. quiet place to sleep.

title: (46824) - 34 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: Perfect point to park and be able to visit the puddles of cheese! Highly recommended!!

title: (46880) Bocairent - 16 Calle San Jaime
description: Parking to spend the night, quiet despite waking up a rooster. The town very nice and especially the caves.

title: (46842) Rugat - 14 Carrer Jaume I
description: A very nice quiet place to stay. Access only suitable for van. Barbecue area and children's playground.

title: (46880) Bocairente - 1 Calle de la Vía
description: Parking next to the restaurant but not restaurant owned it seems to me. Various cars park here. One big seat next to an antique wagon. Other standard, passenger seats. Small motorhomes of the VW Caravelle type will fit. Next to it there is a playground and a water tap, in the park.

name: Camping Natura
title: (46842) Camping Natura
description: Camping Natura - Rugat family camping. Close to various hiking spots.

title: (46269) Tous - 10 CV-5412
description: The Lake of Tous. Possibility to spend the night. I saw the Guardia Civil, they told me that it was not a problem. Great view. Very clean water.

title: (46292) sentido - km 378 Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Rest area with hot shower. Clean toilets and shower, good WiFi and friendly staff.

title: (46292) - 18 Plaça Numero 9
description: Free drinking water with good pressure and free air by REPSOL (just near the exit to highway again on the right)

title: (46838) Benicolet - CV-610
description: Very quiet recreational area. It has paelleros and a traditional washing machine as well as a source of non-potable water.

title: (46824) Quesa - Avenida Corbera
description: Many parking opportunities along little-used dirt road through forest above Los Charcos canyon & pools. Further along a side-track and with a short walk & scramble it is possible to visit the prehistoric rock paintings at Abrigo de Voro.

name: Campamento Rio Grande
title: (46824) Campamento Rio Grande
description: It really is not a campsite, it is a campground. It is in a very good area, you are walking to the "Charcos de Quesa" along a path. It has bathrooms, showers, hot water, a lot of tranquility, picnic tables scattered throughout the place. It is possible to cook with wood in the paelleros arranged for it. Good site and very pleasant treatment. If you go, contact the owner by WhatsApp, in case he is not there.  The photos are from the Charcos de Quesa. There is a small section of track, but a motorhome enters, if it is very high, enter through the second door, which has no stop.

title: (46842) Rugat - 54 Plaça Gral Diseminados
description:
Picnic area in the middle of nature.
There is no drinking water, but you sleep very peacefully.
10 minutes away there is a raft to bathe.

title: (03840) Gaianes - 12 Avinguda l'Estació
description: It's a bus stop with a drinking water fountain next to it. Not a place to park or stay! Just fill up water bottles. Few shops and restaurants in the village. Spend a few bucks as a thank you to the town of Gaianes.

name: Naturist Camping Sierra Natura Enguera
title: (46811) Naturist Camping Sierra Natura Enguera
description: Naturist campsite Sierra Natura. A truly special place, away from the crowds, imbued with tranquility, freedom and respect. The sites are separated from each other and scattered in nature. The buildings and the pool are very original and beautiful. On the road up the highway, there is a VERY closed and framed curve area in which caution is appropriate and you have to honk to be tracked. Prices are good.

title: (46880) Urbanització Pinatell -
description: Quiet place in the middle of nature with a natural spring and good views. access by somewhat bumpy road.

title: (03839) Muro d'Alcoi - 24 Camí Racó-Roca
description: Treated water for domestic use

title: (46880) Urbanització Pinatell -
description: Quiet place and highly recommended! For us better than those around. The only thing to keep in mind is that being next to the road, from 8 in the morning people usually start passing by, by bike or walking (not many, but they do happen)

name: Camping Mariola
title: (46880) Camping Mariola
description: Camping Mariola. Camping in the middle of the natural park in winter, very calm July and August. Spectacular routes running bike etc ...

title: (03830) Muro de Alcoy - 71 Carrer Josep Bono
title_short: (03830) Muro de Alcoy - 71 Carrer Josep Bono
description: Large parking place located next to a soccer field on the outskirts of the town, with street lamp lighting and pleasant to spend a night, without noise at night as it is not a busy street. Close to supermarket-type services and next to a playground

title: (46880) Bocairent - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking area, 1 km along a gravel road. BBQ available. Quiet.

title: (46825) Bicorp - 32 Extramuros Diseminados
description: Clear flat space by the river, easy gravel path to access it. Very quiet area, no amenities

title: (46825) Bicorp - Unnamed Road
description: Level parking in the middle of nature. If you go further down to the river there are many more hidden places there and very natural, with the river next to it. the location is very close to the town, next to a not traveled road

title: (46880) Bocairent - CV-794
description: Car park with bathroom, services and barbecue, small but very clean, non-potable water. Pleasant and perfect for spending the night, very close there is a campsite. Small parking lot but about 300 meters there is another barbecue and more parking space. Surrounded by nature.

title: (46842) Terrateig - 261 Plaça Numero 1
description: Pretty picnic area near a hermitage and the CV 60. Pleasant stopover with picnic tables.

title: (46880) - 456 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Perfect to sleep. Very calm. Let's not take out chairs and tables. Wonderful Natural Park discretion. If we respect we will be respected ..

title: (46269) Tous - CV-5412
description: Small parking lot with great views of the coast ..

name: Camping La Falaguera
title: (46758) Camping La Falaguera
description: Camping, super quiet, in the mountains and near the beach of Gandia, a municipality declared of speological interest,

title: (46880) Bocairent - 548 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Location on enclosed terrain - use GPS coordinates - fully fenced - in the middle of the protected nature reserve Sierra Mariola - paradise for nature lovers - reservations recommended - power only during sun hours (Solarsystem) - historic town of Bocairent at 12 km - center 13km

title: (46758) Barx - 205 Plaça Poligono 10
description: Picnic areas covered with a roof. There are paelleros in which you can barbecue according to the level of pre-emergency fire (there is a panel which provides information). There is a small raft ideal for cooling off a bit. There is garbage in the recreational area, although I recommend using the containers on the road.

title: (46600) Alzira - 7 Carrer Germanes Franciscanes
description: Parking close enough to visit the city

title: (46600) Alzira - 23 Carrer de Gabriela Mistral
description: Laundromat, laundromat, parking space in adjacent streets, friendly staff. payment by card or cash, several languages available.

title: (46880) Bocairent - 340 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Large parking lot to rest, asphalt road if you enter through the entrance that comes from Bocairent.

title: (46758) Barx - 37 Partida Nevera
description: A nice quiet place with picnic benches and water.

title: (46750) Simat de Valldigna - CV-675
description: Place with wonderful views to spend the night
